verses.verse: "For,<WH3117> behold, in those days, and in that time,<WH6256> when<WH6256> I restore the fortunes<WH7622> of Judah<WH3063> and Jerusalem,<WH3389>

I will gather<WH6908> all nations,<WH1471> and will bring them down<WH3381> into the valley<WH6010> of Jehoshaphat;<WH3092> and I will execute judgment<WH8199> on them there for my people,<WH5971> and for my heritage,<WH5159> Israel,<WH3478> whom they have scattered<WH6340> among the nations.<WH1471> They have divided<WH2505> my land,<WH776>
and have cast<WH3032> lots<WH1486> for my people,<WH5971> and have given<WH5414> a boy<WH3206> for a prostitute,<WH2181> and sold<WH4376> a girl<WH3207> for wine,<WH3196> that they may drink.<WH8354>

"Yes,<WH6865> and what are you to me, Tyre, and Sidon,<WH6721> and all the regions<WH1552> of Philistia?<WH6429> Will<WH7999> you repay<WH1580> me?<WH1580> And if you repay me,<WH7031> I will swiftly and speedily<WH4120> return<WH7725> your repayment<WH1576> on your own head.<WH7218>
Because you have taken<WH3947> my silver<WH3701> and my gold,<WH2091> and have carried<WH935> my finest<WH2896> treasures<WH4261> into your temples,<WH1964>

and have sold<WH4376> the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> and the children<WH1121> of Jerusalem<WH3389> to the sons of the Greeks,<WH3125> that you may remove them far<WH7368> from their border.<WH1366>
Behold,<WH5782> I will stir them up out of the place<WH4725> where you have sold<WH4376> them,<WH7725> and will return your repayment<WH1576> on your own head;<WH7218>

and I will sell<WH4376> your sons<WH1121> and your daughters<WH1323> into the hands<WH3027> of the children<WH1121> of Judah,<WH3063> and they will sell<WH4376> them to the men of Sheba,<WH7615> to a faraway<WH7350> nation,<WH1471> for Yahweh<WH3068> has spoken it.<WH1696>"

Proclaim<WH7121> this among the nations:<WH1471> "Prepare<WH6942> for war!<WH4421> Stir up<WH5782> the mighty men.<WH1368> Let all the<WH582> warriors<WH4421> draw near.<WH5066> Let them come up.<WH5927>
Beat<WH3807> your plowshares<WH855> into swords,<WH2719> and your pruning hooks<WH4211> into spears.<WH7420> Let the weak<WH2523> say,<WH559> <WH1368> 'I am strong.'
Hurry<WH5789> and come,<WH935> all you surrounding nations,<WH1471> and gather<WH5439> yourselves together.<WH6908>" Cause your mighty ones<WH1368> to come down<WH5181> there,<WH3068> Yahweh.

"Let the nations<WH1471> arouse<WH5782> themselves,<WH5927> and come up to the valley<WH6010> of Jehoshaphat;<WH3092> for there will I sit<WH3427> to judge<WH8199> all the surrounding<WH5439> nations.<WH1471>

Put<WH7971> in the sickle;<WH4038> for the harvest<WH7105> is ripe.<WH1310> Come,<WH935> tread,<WH3381> for the winepress<WH1660> is full,<WH4390> the vats<WH3342> overflow,<WH7783> for their wickedness<WH7451> is great.<WH7227>"
Multitudes,<WH1995> multitudes<WH1995> in the valley<WH6010> of decision!<WH2742> For the day<WH3117> of Yahweh<WH3068> is near,<WH7138> in the valley<WH6010> of decision.<WH2742>
The sun<WH8121> and the moon<WH3394> are darkened,<WH6937> and the stars<WH3556> withdraw<WH622> their shining.<WH5051>

Yahweh<WH3068> will roar<WH7580> from Zion,<WH6726> and<WH5414> thunder<WH6963> from Jerusalem;<WH3389> and the heavens<WH8064> and the earth<WH776> will shake;<WH7493> but Yahweh<WH3068> will be a refuge<WH4268> to his people,<WH5971> and a stronghold<WH4581> to the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

"So you will know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh,<WH3068> your God,<WH430> dwelling<WH7931> in Zion,<WH6726> my holy<WH6944> mountain.<WH2022> Then Jerusalem<WH3389> will be holy,<WH6944> and no strangers<WH2114> will pass through her any more.<WH5674>

It will happen in that day,<WH3117> that the mountains<WH2022> will drop down<WH5197> sweet wine,<WH6071> the hills<WH1389> will flow<WH3212> with milk,<WH2461> all the brooks<WH650> of Judah<WH3063> will flow<WH3212> with waters,<WH4325> and a fountain<WH4599> will come forth<WH3318> from the house<WH1004> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and will water<WH8248> the valley<WH5158> of Shittim.<WH7851>

Egypt<WH4714> will be a desolation,<WH8077> and Edom<WH123> will be a desolate<WH8077> wilderness,<WH4057> for the violence<WH2555> done to the children<WH1121> of Judah,<WH3063> because they have shed<WH8210> innocent<WH5355> blood<WH1818> in their land.<WH776>
But Judah<WH3063> will be inhabited<WH3427> forever,<WH5769> and Jerusalem<WH3389> from generation<WH1755> to generation.<WH1755>
I will cleanse<WH5352> their blood,<WH1818> that I have not cleansed:<WH5352> for Yahweh<WH3068> dwells<WH7931> in Zion.<WH6726>"
